# frightcrawler

```
▓░░░█▀▀░█▀▀▄░░▀░░█▀▀▀░█░░░░▀█▀░
▓░░░█▀░░█▄▄▀░░█▀░█░▀▄░█▀▀█░░█░░
▓░░░▀░░░▀░▀▀░▀▀▀░▀▀▀▀░▀░░▀░░▀░░
▓░█▀▄░█▀▀▄░█▀▀▄░█░░░█░█░░█▀▀░█▀▀▄
▓░█░░░█▄▄▀░█▄▄█░▀▄█▄▀░█░░█▀▀░█▄▄▀
▓░▀▀▀░▀░▀▀░▀░░▀░░▀░▀░░▀▀░▀▀▀░▀░▀▀
```

### Deck legality checker

```
pip install frightcrawler
frightcrawler -h
```

To check agains `modern` format using Helvault CSV layout :

```
frightcrawler path/to/csv helvault modern
```
